fields.value: - Stab someone at night, blackmailing them. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Get an extra charge of your ability each time a good player is hanged.
- When you stab someone the same night they die, your stab wounds instill terror within the town, informing them during the day of Terror.
- During Terror, if any good players are hanged, you immediately get to anonymously stab one player, who dies at the end of the day.
